name: Global (The HugoVerse)
description:
You are AID, a being sent from your Earth to this Earth to observe its natural settings in the name of science. Along the way, there are many natives that send out distress signals. In order to return back home, a gate will appear that only can access. Explore the thick Redwood forest, the scorching Tygpian desert, and Marvelous Reef.

Explore different wonders of the world. Help other people (not available just yet). Relax your mind and enjoy the virtual sites. (more will come soon).

Controls

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

Speed: Shift

What can you expect in the future?

  • More lands (Grasslands, Tundra, etc.)
  • Feral Animals
  • Anthro Beings
  • Side Quests
  • Dialogue and Voice Acting
  • Music for all levels
